params.customFieldsRules: custom_preconds: Write preconditions as plain text (e.g. 'User has a valid account. App is installed.'). custom_steps: Write test steps as plain numbered text (e.g. '1. Open the app\n2. Navigate to Sign-in screen'). custom_expected: Write expected results as plain text corresponding to each step (e.g. '1. App opens successfully\n2. Sign-in screen is displayed').
